SYSTEM: PROLEGintro_eng_long.pdf: Página 8
Relevant Document Retrieval
• ROSS Intelligence developed document retrieval system using IBM
Watson program to replace legal assistants by computer program.
• ROSS made a contract with Baker & Hostetler, which is the large
law ﬁrm in US in 2016.
• ROSS program saves the Baker and Hostetler ﬁrm a lot of time
and money that they would have spent on human paralegals and
legal researchers.
8
speaker: SYSTEM
